sleaze.translation[0].definitions[0].def: immoral behaviour, especially involving sex or lies
sleaze.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Many people are tired of all the sleaze on TV.
sleaze.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who behaves in an immoral or dishonest way
sleaze.translation[1].definitions[0].def: immoral behaviour, especially involving money or sex
sleaze.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The government created a standing committee to investigate allegations of sleaze.
